  • Classes in atlantis.framework used by atlantis.engine 
    Class and Description
    Game
    The Game class provide basic initialization and game logic.
    GameComponentCollection
    A GameComponentCollection is a container of GameComponent (and DrawableGameComponent) that is updated and drawn on each frame
    GameTime
    Represents the time that elapses during the game
    IDrawable
    An interface to draw objects on screen
    IUpdateable
    An interface to update object
    Rectangle
    Define a rectangle with coordinates and size

  • Classes in atlantis.framework used by atlantis.engine.graphics3d 
    Class and Description
    Matrix
    A matrix 4x4 Some methods has been ported from the open source project SharpDX.
    Vector3
    A Vector3 class that represent a vector with 3 coordinates X, Y and Z.
